backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing note management (CRUD, self-destruct timers), user profiles, share links with encryption, blob storage, and role-based access control using ICP blockchain storage with Principal-based authentication.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including responsive side-by-side layout, keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N, Ctrl+S, Esc), desktop install prompt, and cross-device note sync via ICP blockchain with high confidence test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including main app with TanStack Router, React Query hooks for backend operations, Cyber-Tech themed UI components (lock animation, header, footer, editors), voice recording with transcription, and responsive layouts.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag and root div mounting React application titled 'CypherSafe Decentralized Private Vault'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing authentication flow with Internet Identity, routing between authenticated pages (notes, settings, guides) and public secure note view route (/s/$shareId), with splash screen, scanning animation, profile setup, and welcome popup orchestration.
frontend/src/components/DataOwnershipTer: Terms page component with Cyber-Tech styling explaining data ownership (ICP blockchain storage), voice data privacy (local browser processing), no tracking policy, and liability disclaimer with back navigation to settings.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying end-to-end encryption messaging with lock icon, blockchain security statement, and CypherSafe copyright in Cyber-Tech theme with neon borders.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenEditor: Full-screen note editor component supporting create/edit modes with speech recognition (English/Hindi), auto-save, keyboard shortcuts, self-destruct timer, and share functionality with animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, authentication controls (Internet Identity login/logout), user profile display, and navigation menu (Our Story, Quick Guide, Settings) in a responsive sheet layout.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Desktop-only PWA install prompt banner that appears on screens wider than 1024px, handles beforeinstallprompt event, and persists dismissal state to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/LockAnimation.ts: Loading screen component displaying an animated lock icon cycling through 5 frames at 400ms intervals with pulsing and neon glow effects.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Pre-authentication landing page showcasing CypherSafe features (encryption, blockchain storage, zero knowledge) with Internet Identity login button and feature cards.
frontend/src/components/NotesApp.tsx: Main notes dashboard component managing note list display, search filtering, editor overlay state, voice greeting initialization, expired notes cleanup, and keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N for new note, Escape to close).
frontend/src/components/NotesList.tsx: Scrollable list component displaying notes sorted by last modified date with self-destruct countdown timers, selection state, loading skeletons, and empty state messaging.
frontend/src/components/OurStory.tsx: Displays the CypherSafe mission and story page with navigation back to notes, explaining the privacy-focused blockchain approach and zero-knowledge architecture.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: First-time user onboarding component that prompts for name input and saves user profile with a form submission handler.
frontend/src/components/QuickGuide.tsx: Help page component displaying step-by-step instructions for using CypherSafe features including authentication, creating notes, saving, and searching.
frontend/src/components/ScanningAnimatio: Full-screen overlay animation component showing a scanning effect with fade-out transition, used during authentication or loading states.
frontend/src/components/SecureNoteViewPa: Public page for viewing encrypted shared notes via link, handles decryption using URL hash key and displays error states for expired or invalid links.
frontend/src/components/Settings.tsx: Settings page with toggle for AI voice greeting preference and navigation to data ownership terms, using user profile queries.
Modal dialog for generating encrypted share links with options for view-once or timed expiry, handles client-side encryption and clipboard copying.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Initial loading screen displaying CypherSafe logo with zoom-out animation and 'Powered by Internet Computer' branding before transitioning to main app.
frontend/src/components/VaultLocked.tsx: Displays a full-screen lock overlay with authentication button when the vault is locked. Shows loading state during login and supports WebAuthn devices.
frontend/src/components/WelcomePopup.tsx: Shows a welcome dialog to new users explaining the private, blockchain-encrypted nature of the vault. Marks the popup as seen when dismissed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking. Handles delegation identity validation and storage.
Registers global keyboard shortcuts for Ctrl+N (new note), Ctrl+S (save), and Escape (exit editor) with authentication-aware enablement.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile and note CRUD operations, including welcome popup tracking, greeting preferences, and note self-destruct functionality with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceGreeting.ts: Plays a time-based voice greeting with a soft chime when the vault is unlocked, using speech synthesis with enhanced voice settings for a premium experience.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines the cyber-tech theme with OKLCH color system, neon glow effects, glass morphism, and custom fonts (Orbitron, Exo 2) for the vault UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/shareCrypto.ts: Provides client-side AES-GCM encryption and decryption functions for secure note sharing using the Web Crypto API, including base64 encoding/decoding utilities for key transport.
frontend/src/utils/shareLink.ts: Builds share URLs by combining a share ID with a base64-encoded decryption key in the URL hash fragment.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, custom fonts (Orbitron, Exo 2), extended theme tokens for UI components, and animation keyframes for accordions.
project_state.json: Project metadata for CypherSafe defining implemented features (responsive layout, keyboard shortcuts, desktop install prompt, ICP blockchain sync) and architectural notes about the 1024px breakpoint and focus mode.
